summary: REPETITIVE TIRE PRESSURE MONITORING SYSTEM SENSOR FAILURES. 1 REPLACED MAY 2016, 2 REPLACED NOVEMBER 2016, 1 REPLACED MAY 2017, 2 REPLACED JUNE 2017. DODGE NOT FORTHCOMING WITH INFORMATION ON CAUSE AND FIX. FAILURES OCCURRED UNDER VARIOUS CONDITIONS, SOME AFTER SITTING OVER NIGHT, SOME WHILE ON THE HIGHWAY, OTHERS DURING A REST STOP ALONG A HIGHWAY.
